## This session

In this session, you will complete the following tasks:

1. Complete the chapter ["GitHub Intro"](https://lennartwittkuhn.com/version-control-book/chapters/github-intro.html) in the Version Control Book.
1. Complete the exercises for the [`recipes` project](#recipes-project).

As always:

1. Try out the commands in the chapter and play around with them.
1. Check whether you have achieved the [learning objectives](#learning-objectives)(#learning-objectives).

## `recipes` project

At the end of this session, you should have accomplished the following:

1. Created a new GitHub repository and uploaded your `recipe` project
1. Cleaned up your project by deleting unnecessary files and branches
